Index

AboutYou/AboutYou.js

Provides access to the ABOUT YOU Frontend Platform.
Version:
  • 0.1.1
Author:
  • patrick.michelberger@aboutyou.de
Source:
  • AboutYou.js, line 3

Example

var aboutYou = new AboutYou(100,'3ed93394c2b5ebd12c104b177b928ad0');

aboutYou.getCategoryTree().then(function(categories) {
    categories.forEach(function(category) {
        var name = category.getName();
        console.log("Category name: ", name);
    });
});
